definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: The Kazakhs treated us to their best cream tea.
sentences.chinese: 這些哈薩克人請我們吃了他們最好的奶茶。

sentences.english: Up to now, Kazak people retain the historical memory of yuci from which they come.
sentences.chinese: 直至今日，哈薩克人依然保留其玉茲屬性的歷史記憶。

sentences.english: When they communicate with their Kazak neighbors, they speak Kazak.
sentences.chinese: 和周邊的哈薩克人交流時就會用哈語。

sentences.english: And we can take this opportunity to know more about the lives of Kazaks, the Eagles of the Grassland.
sentences.chinese: 正好我們可以去了解一下草原雄鷹哈薩克人的生活。

sentences.english: There are also smaller ethnic groups like Kazaks.
sentences.chinese: 此外新疆也有小一些的族羣，比如哈薩克人。
